name: Hit Sniffer Live Blog Analytics
author: Armin Nikdel

sections.description:
Hit Sniffer service has shutdown on September 2016
This plugin now serve as a memorial and soon to be deleted.

Those who look for similiar services, they can use Hit Steps.
sections.changelog:
2.12

  • Remove analytics feature from plugin.

2.11

  • Hitsniffer service is shutdown. Please use alternatives.

2.10

  • Added: Cookie block method added to plugin, to enforce avoiding counting admin of website.
  • Added: Multi language support for all strings inside of plugin texts.

2.9

  • Updated compatibility for WordPress v4.3
  • WP_DEBUG friendly

2.8.9

  • Minor bug fix for Google Chrome

2.8.8

  • Fixed SEO image attribute requirement.

2.8.6

  • Optional Floating chat widget. disabled by default.

2.8.5

  • Floating Chat Widget

2.8.3.15

  • Compatibility verification and update for WordPress 3.6

2.8.3.3

  • Mini dashboard is enabled by default now

2.8.3

  • Added ability to remove Hitsniffer mini dashboard (recent visitors) widget from WordPress dashboard in setting page.

2.8.2

  • New chat script in async mode ( make your website load faster if you are using hitsniffer live support feature )
  • Fixed a bug in chat module causing customer name be “Visitor” instead of identifable IP address or Name.
  • Minor fixes to chat module widget of wordpress have been applied.

2.8

  • Added Hitsniffer mini dashboard (recent visitors) widget to WordPress dashboard.

2.7.2

  • server stability update.
  • WP 3.5.1 compatibility update

2.7

  • Compatibility with WordPress 3.4
  • Better support for statistics widget

2.6.1

  • World Map admin widget configured to show today visitors instead of online visitors.

2.6

  • World Map admin widget added
  • Added World Map feature screenshot to plugin
  • Updated Configuration page theme

2.5.9

  • Security Fix: Option to enable hitsniffer dashboard widget for administrators only. ( Thanks to R. Ramos )

2.5.8

  • New Layout for Visitor’s Detailed page, counting returning visits too.
  • Map Clustering in hitsniffer dashboard.
  • New Visitor sound and message notification in hitsniffer dashboard.
  • Visitor’s Search, Improved Chat Quality.
  • Optimized and refreshed “Pages” and “Visitors” section in hitsniffer’s dashboard.

2.5.7.1

  • Live Chat Invitation have Decline button now

2.5.7

  • Ability to use Custom Online/Offline Icon for Live Support Button

2.5.6

  • New Theme for WordPress Dashboard Widget
  • Widget Screenshot updated.

2.5.2

  • Fixed Language errors in plugin.

2.5

  • New Widget Added, Hit Sniffer Statistics allow show your site statistics in your website.
  • New Screenshots added.
  • Added compatibility for wordpress 3.2
  • few bugs with previous versions has been fixed
  • fixed broken compatibility for wordpress 1.5

2.4.5.6

  • Temporary disabled One Click Install Feature.

2.4.5.5

  • Ability to customize widget theme.

2.4.5

  • New Way to Manage One Click Install.

2.4.4.2

  • Warming Up to Build New Features, Stay Tuned! Updated Magic Sign up for now.

2.4.2

  • WordPress v3.1.2 Support

2.4

  • One Click Install Feature

2.3.8.9

  • Added new screenshots.

2.3.8

  • Improved Stablity.
  • Improved Support.

2.3.5

  • WP-Super-Cache Compatibility.

2.3.4

  • Hit Sniffer is stable and smooth after crash.
  • New Widget in Dashboard

2.3

  • Improved usablity inside dashboard.
  • Better iPad and iPhone Support.
  • Better support for browsers without flash player.

2.2.7

  • Full WP v3.1 compatibility
  • New user guide.

2.2.6.7

  • Core update. Real time visitor detail page ( you will see each new hit in their detail page )

2.2.4

  • Changed Widget size, to avoid scrolling. Fixing Timezone.

2.2.3

  • Goal and Campaign Tracking Added

2.2.1

  • Control to disable Chat Service to decrease site load

2.2

  • Added Live Chat support widget.

2.1.9

  • Better Chat Support. Sound Notification.

2.1.8

  • Fixed code in templates without footer

2.1.5

  • Fixed HTML Email reports.
  • Valid XHTML Code

2.1

  • HTTPS SSL Support

2

  • Faster Javascript Rendering Code on your site

1.9.9

  • Fixed Dashboard Stop Script Problem
  • Fixed Widget Padding problem
  • Support non-flash, image based graph

1.9.8.5

  • Hit Sniffer is stable now.
  • Thumbnail when holding mouse over pages and referers.
  • more reliable dashboard on old computers.

1.9.8.3

  • Dashboard Link Error fix

1.9.7

  • PHP4 Bug fix

1.9.6

  • Security Fix

1.9.5

  • Server-Side Tag generating for accurate tracking of visitors without Javascript.
  • MySearch Parameter passed to Hit Sniffer to track Searches in site.
  • ipname and mysearch automatically translate for html tag.

1.9.1

  • Fine Tune Tags

1.9

  • Ability to Ignore Admin Visits
  • Ability to Track your visitors by their name.

1.8.5

  • Ability to enable/disable wordpress dashboard widget

1.8.2

  • Fixed WordPress Dashboard

1.8

  • New WordPress Dashboard

1.7.6

  • ablity to enter api code more comfortly without need to remove extra spaces in setting text field.

1.7.4

  • Updated Links.

1.7.3

  • Updated dashboard widget.
  • Add pre 2.7 ( those without dashboard widget ) support

1.7.2

  • Updated tags.

1.7.1

  • Updated Detail Link.

1.7

  • Updated Dashboard Widget.
  • Updated Plugin Tags
  • New Hit Sniffer Dashboard Menu.
  • New Graph on WordPress Dashboard.

1.6

  • Updated Dashboard Widget.
  • Optimized for Speed.
  • New Dashboard.

1.5.2

  • Updated Dashboard Widget.

1.5.1

  • Dashboard Widget fix.

1.5

  • New Dashboard Widget.

1.3

  • Fixed instruction and tags of script.

1.2

  • Direct Link to Hit Sniffer Dashboard from WordPress Dashboard

1.1

  • Added easier access to dashboard.
  • Fixed some bugs.

1.0

  • Base Startup

short_description: Hit Sniffer was a powerful real time website visitor activity tracker.
description:
Hit Sniffer service has shutdown on September 2016
This plugin now serve as a memorial and soon to be deleted.

Those who look for similiar services, they can use Hit Steps.
